content:
Summary

  • Develop a deep understanding of isolation and compatibility issues.

  • Devise a set of architectural classifications and mechanisms which can enable process isolation and validation

  • Understand the protection / validation implications of design choices / features

  • Design a series of working systems which demonstrate the robustness of these results in the presence of errors

  • Demonstrate them on prototype hardware (UCI?)
